short_description: absolute audio is an audiology clinic based in godfrey, illinois, united states.
long_description: since the year 2000, our lead specialist, aaron gingrich has been helping improve the quality of life for thousands of people across illinois. he is known for doing everything possible to provide a perfect transition to better hearing for his patients by evaluating their hearing deficit with the most state of the art testing and advanced assessment techniques. offering the best hearing solutions in the business, absolute audio evaluates your hearing loss, individual lifestyle, and unique requirements before suggesting the absolute best solution for your individual needs.
